Audit of Pathology data elements associated with neuro specimens

All GFR test results for patients with a nephrectomy in a specified date range.
EGFRvIII Screening report for Protocol 10-125 associated with neuro patients with a date range
report.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT (pt.PtMRN)MRN, (pt.PtLastName+', '+pt.PtFirstName)_Patient_Name_, (app.ApptPhysician)_Appt_Physician_,convert(VARCHAR(10),app.ApptClinicDate,101)_Appt_Date_, RIGHT(convert(varchar, ApptTime, 100),7)_Time_, (app.ApptVisitType)Type,convert(VARCHAR(10),op.OpDate,101)ORDate, convert(VARCHAR(10),pa.PathDate,101)PathDate,convert(VARCHAR(10),pathT.PathDate,101)PathTestDt, (pathT.PathTest)_Test_, (pathT.PathResult)Result, (pathT.PathNotes)Notes,(pathT.PathQuality)Quality, MedTxType,MedTxAgent FROM Patients pt INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions inst ON pt.Patientid = inst.Patientid INNER JOIN Appointments app ON pt.PtMRN=app.ApptMRN INNER JOIN OperatingRoomDetails op ON pt.PatientId=op.PatientId AND OpService='Neurosurgery' INNER JOIN Pathology pa ON pt.PatientId=pa.PatientId AND pa.OperatingRoomDetailId=op.OperatingRoomDetailId LEFT OUTER JOIN PathTest pathT ON pa.PathologyId=pathT.PathologyId And pathT.PathTest IN ('EGFRvIII','PTEN','LC-MAP') LEFT OUTER JOIN MedicalTherapy mt ON mt.PatientId=pt.PatientId AND (MedTxDisease='Brain' OR MedTxSite='Brain') WHERE pt.PtMRN!='TEST0000' AND InstitutionId=15 And (app.ApptDept Like '%neuro%' Or app.ApptDept In ('COMMACK MED ONC-1','COMMACK MED ONC-2','BSK MED ONC')) And (ApptClinicDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) ORDER BY _Appt_Date_, _Time_

report.reportDescription: 12-245 protocol screening report for neuro patients with a date range
report.sqlStatement: select distinct (PtMRN)MRN,(ptLastName+', '+ptFirstName)PatientName,ApptPhysician,convert(VARCHAR(10),app.ApptClinicDate,101)ApptDate, RIGHT(convert(varchar,ApptTime, 100),7)ApptTime, (app.ApptVisitType)ApptType,ApptStatus,ApptNotes, ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10),OpDate,101),'N/A')[MSK_OpDate],(pa.PathHistology)Histology, CASE WHEN s.SpecimenSubType IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS [TumorBanked?], CASE WHEN s1.SpecimenSubType IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS [BloodBanked?], CASE WHEN (proSt.protocolDate IS NOT NULL OR proSt.ptprotocolstatus IS NOT NULL) THEN (ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar(10),proSt.protocolDate,101),'N/A')+': '+ISNULL(proSt.ptprotocolstatus,'N/A')) ELSE 'N/A' END AS [12-245] FROM Patients pt INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions inst ON pt.Patientid = inst.Patientid INNER JOIN Appointments app ON pt.PtMRN=app.ApptMRN INNER JOIN OperatingRoomDetails op ON pt.PatientId=op.PatientId and OpService='Neurosurgery' AND OpQuality='STD' INNER JOIN Pathology pa on op.OperatingRoomDetailId=pa.OperatingRoomDetailId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenAccessions sa ON sa.PatientId = op.PatientId AND (OpDate=AccessionDate Or OpDate=DateBanked) AND AccessionDepartment='Neurosurgery' LEFT OUTER JOIN Specimens s ON s.SpecimenAccessionId = sa.SpecimenAccessionId AND s.SpecimenSubType='Tumor' LEFT OUTER JOIN Specimens s1 ON s1.SpecimenAccessionId = sa.SpecimenAccessionId AND s1.SpecimenSubType='Whole Blood' LEFT OUTER JOIN (select DISTINCT pp.PatientId,p.ProtocolNum,(pps.ptprotocolStatusDate)ProtocolDate,pps.ptprotocolstatus from patientprotocols pp INNER JOIN protocols p on p.ProtocolId=pp.ProtocolId INNER JOIN patientprotocolstatus pps on pp.PatientProtocolId=pps.PatientProtocolId WHERE p.ProtocolNum IN ('12-245'))proSt on proSt.PatientId=pt.PatientId WHERE pt.PatientId!=29214 AND InstitutionId=15 AND PathHistology IN (SELECT distinct LkpCode FROM LookupCodes a INNER JOIN LookupCodeAttributes b ON a.LookupCodeId=b.LookupCodeId WHERE AttributeValue IN ('GBMs')) And (app.ApptDept In ('NEURO 53-5','COMMACK MED ONC-1','COMMACK MED ONC-2','BSK MED ONC')) AND ApptClinicDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate AND ApptPhysician like '%'+ @Physician +'%' ORDER BY ApptPhysician,ApptDate,ApptTime

report.id: Clinical Trials: Protocol Patient Toxicities RAW Data
report.reportTitle: Clinical Trials: Protocol Patient Toxicities RAW Data
report.reportDescription: Toxicity realted data by trial
report.sqlStatement:
-- set dataset DECLARE @Dataset TABLE(PatientId int) INSERT INTO @Dataset(PatientId) SELECT PatientId FROM @Patients
-- TABLE: Get a list of all patient's screened (failed or passed) for protocol DECLARE @ProtocolPopulation TABLE ( PatientId int, PtAge int, PatientProtocolId int, PtProtocolStudyId varchar(255), PatientSchemaId int, ProtocolId int, ProtocolVersionId int, ProtocolSchemaId int, StartDate datetime, ConsentDate datetime, OnStudyDate datetime, OffTreatmentDate datetime, OffStudyDate datetime, FailedScreeningDate datetime )
-- patients on trial INSERT INTO @ProtocolPopulation SELECT c.PatientId, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DAY, c.PtBirthDate, ISNULL(c.PtDeathDate, GETDATE()) ) / 365.25) AS PtAge, a.[PatientProtocolId], a.[PtProtocolStudyId], a.[PatientSchemaId], a.[ProtocolId], a.[ProtocolVersionId], a.[ProtocolSchemaId], a.[StartDate], a.[ConsentDate], a.[OnStudyDate], a.[OffTreatmentDate], a.[OffStudyDate], a.[FailedScreeningDate] FROM ( SELECT [PatientId], [PatientProtocolId], [PtProtocolStudyId], [PatientSchemaId], [ProtocolId], [ProtocolVersionId], [ProtocolSchemaId], [StartDate], [Consented] AS [ConsentDate], [On Study] AS [OnStudyDate], [Off Treatment] AS [OffTreatmentDate], [Off Study] AS [OffStudyDate], [Failed Screening] AS [FailedScreeningDate] FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT p.PatientId, pp.PatientProtocolId, pp.PtProtocolStudyId, ps.PatientSchemaId, protocol.ProtocolId, pro_version.ProtocolVersionId, pro_schema.ProtocolSchemaId, ps.StartDate, pps.PtProtocolStatus, pps.PtProtocolStatusDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pps.PatientProtocolId, pps.PtProtocolStatus ORDER BY pps.PtProtocolStatusDate ASC) AS StatusRowNum FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Patients dataset ON p.PatientId = dataset.PatientId INNER JOIN PatientProtocols pp ON p.PatientId = pp.PatientId INNER JOIN Protocols protocol ON pp.ProtocolId = protocol.ProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus pps ON pp.PatientProtocolId = pps.PatientProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_PatientSchemas ps ON p.PatientId = ps.PatientId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas pro_schema ON ps.ProtocolSchemaId = pro_schema.ProtocolSchemaId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolVersions pro_version ON protocol.ProtocolId = pro_version.ProtocolId AND pro_schema.ProtocolVersionId = pro_version.ProtocolVersionId WHERE pps.PtProtocolStatus IS NOT NULL ) a PIVOT ( MIN(PtProtocolStatusDate) FOR PtProtocolStatus IN ( [Consented], [On Study], [Off Treatment], [Off Study], [Failed Screening] ) ) AS b WHERE StatusRowNum = 1 ) a INNER JOIN @Dataset b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId INNER JOIN Patients c ON b.PatientId = c.PatientId WHERE a.PtProtocolStudyId IS NOT NULL -- filter by protocol AND (@ProtocolId IS NULL OR @ProtocolId = '' OR @ProtocolId = a.ProtocolId) AND -- filter by site (@OrgNum IS NULL OR @OrgNum = '' OR a.PtProtocolStudyId LIKE @OrgNum + '%') ORDER BY a.ProtocolId, a.ProtocolVersionId, a.ProtocolSchemaId, a.PatientProtocolId
-- TABLE: Get a list of distinct patients currently on study, per treatment arm DECLARE @OnStudyPatients TABLE(PatientId int, PatientProtocolId int, PatientSchemaId int, ConsentDate datetime, StartDate datetime) INSERT INTO @OnStudyPatients(PatientId, PatientProtocolId, PatientSchemaId, ConsentDate, StartDate) SELECT DISTINCT PatientId, PatientProtocolId, PatientSchemaId, ConsentDate, StartDate FROM @ProtocolPopulation
-- TABLE: Get a list of distinct Patient's on trial DECLARE @OnStudyPatientIds TABLE(PatientId int) INSERT INTO @OnStudyPatientIds(PatientId) SELECT DISTINCT PatientId FROM @OnStudyPatients
-- Collapse patient's tox+grade SELECT d.ProtocolNum AS [Protocol], o.ShortName AS [Site], e.PtProtocolStatus AS [Status], ps.ProtocolArmDescription AS [Treatment Arm], c.PtProtocolStudyId AS [Subject ID], a.ToxDateText AS [Start Date], a.ToxStopDateText AS [End Date], a.ToxName AS [Toxicity], MAX(CAST(a.ToxGrade AS int)) AS [Grade], a.ToxRelatedTo AS [Related], a.ToxProbability AS [Attribution] FROM Toxicities a INNER JOIN @OnStudyPatientIds b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId INNER JOIN @ProtocolPopulation c ON a.PatientId = c.PatientId INNER JOIN Protocols d ON c.ProtocolId = d.ProtocolId INNER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas ps ON ps.ProtocolSchemaId = c.ProtocolSchemaId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- get latest status SELECT a.PatientId, a.PatientProtocolId, a.PtProtocolStudyId, a.PtProtocolStatus, a.PtProtocolStatusDate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT p.PatientId, pp.PatientProtocolId, pp.PtProtocolStudyId, pps.PtProtocolStatus, pps.PtProtocolStatusDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pps.PatientProtocolId ORDER BY pps.PtProtocolStatusDate DESC) AS StatusRowNum FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Patients dataset ON p.PatientId = dataset.PatientId INNER JOIN PatientProtocols pp ON p.PatientId = pp.PatientId INNER JOIN Protocols protocol ON pp.ProtocolId = protocol.ProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus pps ON pp.PatientProtocolId = pps.PatientProtocolId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_PatientSchemas ps ON p.PatientId = ps.PatientId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolSchemas pro_schema ON ps.ProtocolSchemaId = pro_schema.ProtocolSchemaId LEFT OUTER JOIN ProtocolMgr_ProtocolVersions pro_version ON protocol.ProtocolId = pro_version.ProtocolId AND pro_schema.ProtocolVersionId = pro_version.ProtocolVersionId WHERE pps.PtProtocolStatus IS NOT NULL ) a WHERE StatusRowNum = 1 ) e ON c.PatientProtocolId = e.PatientProtocolId -- get site LEFT OUTER JOIN ProjectOrganization o ON c.PtProtocolStudyId LIKE o.OrgNum + '%' WHERE ToxName IS NOT NULL -- normalized values AND ISNUMERIC(ToxGrade) = 1 -- only values 1-5 AND ToxGrade > 0 AND ToxGrade < 6 GROUP BY d.ProtocolNum, o.ShortName, e.PtProtocolStatus, ps.ProtocolArmDescription, c.PtProtocolStudyId, a.ToxName, a.ToxDate, a.ToxDateText, a.ToxStopDateText, a.ToxProbability, a.ToxRelatedTo ORDER BY Protocol, ProtocolArmDescription, [Subject ID], a.ToxDate, a.ToxName

Build a prostate dataset using the algorithm

report.sqlStatement:
SELECT s.specimenid, p.Patientid, sa.AccessionProcName, s.specimenReferenceNumber as Specimen_Reference_No, path.PathHistology as Histology, s.specimenType as Sample_Type, s.specimenSubType as SubType, s.specimenPreservationType as Preservation_Type, s.specimenStatus as Specimen_Status, s.specimenOriginalQty as Original_Quantity, s.specimenRemainingQty as Remaining_Quantity, s.specimenUnits as Units, DATEDIFF(year, p.PtBirthDate, GETDATE()) AS Age, p.ptMRN as MRN, site.SiteName as Site, storage.StorageName as Freezer, container.ContainerName as Container, s.boxId, sb.boxName as Box, s.positionId, sp.Position as Position, s.ParentSpecimenId, pp.PathGGS as Gleason_Score, pathSG.PathGrade as Stage_Grade, pathSG.PathStageGroup as Stage_Group, labs.labdatetext as Last_PSA_Date, labs.labresult as PSA_Result FROM Specimens s INNER JOIN SpecimenAccessions sa ON sa.specimenaccessionid=s.specimenaccessionid LEFT OUTER JOIN Patients p ON p.patientid=sa.patientid --INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT Dataset_Patients.* FROM Dataset_Patients ) AS ds ON sa.PatientId= ds.PatientId -- Todo: add this INNER JOIN (" + datasetSql + ") AS ds ON p.PatientId= ds.PatientId " LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenPositions sp ON sp.positionId=s.positionId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenBoxes sb ON sb.boxId=s.boxId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenContainers container ON container.ContainerId = sb.ContainerId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenStorages storage On storage.StorageId = container.StorageId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenSites site ON site.SiteId = storage.SiteId LEFT OUTER JOIN Specimen_SpecimenCollections ssc ON ssc.specimenId=s.specimenId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenCollections sc ON sc.collectionId=ssc.collectionId LEFT OUTER JOIN Pathology path ON path.patientid=p.patientid LEFT OUTER JOIN ProstatectomyPath pp ON pp.PathologyId = path.PathologyId
LEFT OUTER JOIN PathologyStageGrade pathSG ON pathSG.PathologyId=path.PathologyId AND pathSG.PathologyStageGradeId = ( SELECT TOP 1 PathologyStageGradeId FROM PathologyStageGrade WHERE PathologyId = path.PathologyId ORDER BY CASE PathQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'REV' THEN 3 WHEN 'STD' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN LabTests labs ON P.PatientId = labs.PatientId AND labs.LabTestId = ( SELECT TOP 1 LabTestId FROM LabTests WHERE PatientId = P.PatientId AND LabTest = 'PSA' ORDER BY LabDate DESC, CASE LabQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'STD' THEN 3 WHEN 'REV' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC ) --LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Identifier, PatientId FROM Identifiers WHERE IdType= '" + idType + "') AS i ON p.patientId=i.patientId --LEFT OUTER JOIN Pathology path2 ON path2.pathnum = sa.PathologyReferenceNumber WHERE s.specimenReferenceNumber Like '%' + @Reference# + '%' AND path.pathnum = sa.PathologyReferenceNumber ORDER BY specimenReferenceNumber

SELECT s.specimenid, p.Patientid, sa.AccessionProcName, s.specimenReferenceNumber as Reference_No, path.PathHistology as Histology, DATEDIFF(year, p.PtBirthDate, GETDATE()) AS Age, p.ptMRN as MRN, s.specimenType as Sample_Type, s.specimenSubType as SubType, s.specimenPreservationType as Preservation_Type, s.specimenStatus as Status, s.specimenOriginalQty as Original_Quantity, s.specimenRemainingQty as Remaining_Quantity, s.specimenUnits as Units, site.SiteName as Site, storage.StorageName as Freezer, container.ContainerName as Container, s.boxId, sb.boxName as Box, s.positionId, sp.Position as Position, s.ParentSpecimenId, pp.PathGGS, pathSG.PathGrade, pathSG.PathStageGroup, labs.labdatetext as Last_PSA_Date, labs.labresult as PSA_Result FROM Specimens s INNER JOIN SpecimenAccessions sa ON sa.specimenaccessionid=s.specimenaccessionid LEFT OUTER JOIN Patients p ON p.patientid=sa.patientid --INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT Dataset_Patients.* FROM Dataset_Patients ) AS ds ON sa.PatientId= ds.PatientId -- Todo: add this INNER JOIN (" + datasetSql + ") AS ds ON p.PatientId= ds.PatientId " LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenPositions sp ON sp.positionId=s.positionId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenBoxes sb ON sb.boxId=s.boxId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenContainers container ON container.ContainerId = sb.ContainerId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenStorages storage On storage.StorageId = container.StorageId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenSites site ON site.SiteId = storage.SiteId LEFT OUTER JOIN Specimen_SpecimenCollections ssc ON ssc.specimenId=s.specimenId LEFT OUTER JOIN SpecimenCollections sc ON sc.collectionId=ssc.collectionId LEFT OUTER JOIN Pathology path ON path.patientid=p.patientid LEFT OUTER JOIN ProstatectomyPath pp ON pp.PathologyId = path.PathologyId
LEFT OUTER JOIN PathologyStageGrade pathSG ON pathSG.PathologyId=path.PathologyId AND pathSG.PathologyStageGradeId = ( SELECT TOP 1 PathologyStageGradeId FROM PathologyStageGrade WHERE PathologyId = path.PathologyId ORDER BY CASE PathQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'REV' THEN 3 WHEN 'STD' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN LabTests labs ON P.PatientId = labs.PatientId AND labs.LabTestId = ( SELECT TOP 1 LabTestId FROM LabTests WHERE PatientId = P.PatientId AND LabTest = 'PSA' ORDER BY LabDate DESC, CASE LabQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'STD' THEN 3 WHEN 'REV' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC ) WHERE path.PathHistology Like '%' + @Histology + '%' AND path.PathNum = sa.PathologyReferenceNumber ORDER BY sb.boxName, sp.positionId

report.reportDescription: GMT Protocol Screening Report within a date range
report.sqlStatement: SELECT PtMRN as MRN, PtFirstName as First, PtLastName as Last, ApptPhysician as Physician, z.ProtocolNum as Protocol#, z.PtProtocolStatus as Status, z.ptprotocolstatusreason AS Reason, CONVERT(varchar,z.ptprotocolstatusdate,101) AS StatusDate FROM Patients a INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid INNER JOIN (SELECT d.ProtocolNum, a.Patientid, b.PtProtocolStatus, b.ptprotocolstatusreason, b.ptprotocolstatusdate FROM ( SELECT c.patientprotocolid, Patientid, MAX(PtProtocolStatusDate) LastStatusDate FROM PatientProtocols b INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus c ON b.patientProtocolid = c.patientprotocolid INNER JOIN Protocols d ON b.protocolId = d.protocolid GROUP BY patientid, c.patientprotocolid ) a INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus b on a.PatientProtocolid = b.patientprotocolid and a.laststatusdate = b.PtProtocolStatusDate INNER JOIN patientProtocols c ON b.patientProtocolid = c.patientProtocolid INNER JOIN Protocols d ON c.protocolid = d.protocolid ) z on a.patientid = z.patientid INNER JOIN Appointments y ON a.Patientid = y.ApptPatientid WHERE institutionid = 17 and y.apptdept = 'GMT 53' AND ApptClinicDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate GROUP BY PtMRN, a.patientid, PtFirstName, PtLastName, z.Protocolnum, z.PtProtocolStatus, z.ptprotocolstatusreason, z.ptprotocolstatusdate, ApptPhysician ORDER BY PtMRN

report.reportDescription: Head and Neck Protocol Screening Report within a date range
report.sqlStatement: SELECT PtMRN as MRN, PtFirstName as First, PtLastName as Last, ApptPhysician as Physician, z.ProtocolNum as Protocol#, z.PtProtocolStatus as Status, z.ptprotocolstatusreason AS Reason, z.ptprotocolstatusdate AS StatusDate FROM Patients a INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid INNER JOIN (SELECT d.ProtocolNum, a.Patientid, b.PtProtocolStatus, b.ptprotocolstatusreason, b.ptprotocolstatusdate FROM ( SELECT c.patientprotocolid, Patientid, MAX(PtProtocolStatusDate) LastStatusDate FROM PatientProtocols b INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus c ON b.patientProtocolid = c.patientprotocolid INNER JOIN Protocols d ON b.protocolId = d.protocolid GROUP BY patientid, c.patientprotocolid ) a INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus b on a.PatientProtocolid = b.patientprotocolid and a.laststatusdate = b.PtProtocolStatusDate INNER JOIN patientProtocols c ON b.patientProtocolid = c.patientProtocolid INNER JOIN Protocols d ON c.protocolid = d.protocolid ) z on a.patientid = z.patientid INNER JOIN Appointments y ON a.Patientid = y.ApptPatientid WHERE apptphysician in ('shah, Jatin', 'shaha, Ashok', 'Patel, Snehal', 'Singh, Bhuvanesh', 'Kraus, Dennis', 'Boyle, Jay', 'Wong, Richard', 'Ganly, Ian') AND ApptClinicDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate GROUP BY PtMRN, a.patientid, PtFirstName, PtLastName, z.Protocolnum, z.PtProtocolStatus, z.ptprotocolstatusreason, z.ptprotocolstatusdate, ApptPhysician ORDER BY PtMRN

report.reportDescription: Shows counts of procedures for a given date range
report.sqlStatement: Select COUNT(*) as Count, ProcName FROM Procedures WHERE ProcDate >= @FromDate AND ProcDate < = @ToDate Group By ProcName Having Count(*) > 1 Order By Count DESC

notes.title: The chart displays the total number of Procedures performed within given date range.
notes.note: Excludes all procedures with a count of 1

report.reportDescription: Shows counts of procedures per Surgeon within a given date range
report.sqlStatement: Select COUNT(*) as Count, ProcSurgeon FROM Procedures WHERE ProcDate >= @FromDate AND ProcDate < = @ToDate Group By ProcSurgeon Order By ProcSurgeon ASC

notes.title: The chart above represents the total number of Procedures by Surgeon.
notes.note: Surgeon is the ProcSurgeon Value in the Procedures table.

report.reportDescription: Shows all procedures for a given surgeon within a date range
report.sqlStatement: Select ProcDateText, ProcName, ProcSurgeon From Procedures WHERE ProcDate >= @FromDate AND ProcDate < = @ToDate AND ProcSurgeon Like @ProcSurgeon + '%'

report.reportDescription: Lists procedures performed with surgeon and date by given procedure type
report.sqlStatement: Select ProcDateText, ProcName, ProcSurgeon From Procedures WHERE ProcDate >= @FromDate AND ProcDate < = @ToDate AND ProcName Like @ProcName + '%'

report.reportDescription: Shows all eforms that are not approved (or deleted)
report.sqlStatement: SELECT EformId,Patients.PatientId,PtMRN,CurrentStatus,EFormName,EformApptPhysician,EformApptTime,UserName,EForms.EnteredBy,EForms.EnteredTime FROM EForms INNER JOIN Patients ON EForms.PatientId = Patients.PatientId INNER JOIN Users ON EForms.UserId = Users.UserId WHERE (NOT (CurrentStatus IN ('Approved', 'Deleted')) AND PtMRN != 'TEST0000') ORDER BY Users.UserName DESC

DECLARE @PhysicianName varchar(50) SET @PhysicianName = 'SCHOEN, MARY'
DECLARE @Apptdte datetime SET @Apptdte = @ApptDate
-- Variation of Institution names (MSKCC in this case) DECLARE @InstitutionName_1 varchar(50) DECLARE @InstitutionName_2 varchar(50) DECLARE @InstitutionName_3 varchar(50) DECLARE @InstitutionName_4 varchar(50) DECLARE @InstitutionName_5 varchar(50) DECLARE @ProcQuality varchar(50)
SET @InstitutionName_1 = 'Memorial Sloan Kettering' SET @InstitutionName_2 = 'Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center' SET @InstitutionName_3 = 'Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center' SET @InstitutionName_4 = 'MSK' SET @InstitutionName_5 = 'MSKCC' SET @ProcQuality = 'STD'
DECLARE @InstitutionId int SET @InstitutionId = 1
;
WITH ProstatectomyTemp(PatientId, ProcedureId, PtMRN, ProcName, ProcSurgeon, ProcDate, ProcInstitution) AS ( SELECT a.PatientId, b.ProcedureId, a.PtMRN, b.ProcName, b.ProcSurgeon, b.ProcDate, b.ProcInstitution FROM Patients a INNER JOIN Procedures b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions c ON a.PatientId = c.PatientId WHERE b.ProcName IN('RP','RALP', 'SalvRP', 'LP', 'SalvLP','PP','Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy', 'Open prostatectomy','Open radical prostatectomy', 'Open Suprapubic Prostatectomy','Prostatectomy','Radical Prostatectomy', 'Radical Retropubic Prostatectomy', 'Retropubic Prostatectomy', 'Retropubic radical prostatectomy', 'Robotic assisted Radical Prostatectomy', 'Robotic retropubic prostatectomy', 'Robotic Salvage Laparoscopic Prostatectomy', 'Robotic-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy') AND (b.ProcInstitution IN(@InstitutionName_1, @InstitutionName_2, @InstitutionName_3, @InstitutionName_4, @InstitutionName_5) OR b.ProcQuality = @ProcQuality) AND c.InstitutionId = @InstitutionId AND a.PtMRN != 'TEST0000' AND b.ProcSurgeon IN ('EASTHAM', 'COLEMAN', 'DALBAGNI', 'DONAT', 'HERR', 'LAUDONE', 'PARRA', 'RABBANI', 'RUSSO', 'SANDHU', 'SCARDINO', 'TOUIJER', 'BOCHNER', 'CARVER', 'GUILLONNEAU', 'SHEINFELD') ) SELECT Appointments.ApptPhysician, Appointments.ApptLastName, Appointments.ApptFirstName, a.PtMRN, ApptTime, a.ProcName, a.ProcSurgeon, a.ProcDate, a.ProcInstitution, GleasonGrade.PathGGS, GleasonGrade.PathStageT, PreOpPSA FROM ProstatectomyTemp a INNER JOIN -- PreOp PSA (PSA right before prostate surgery) (SELECT b.LabDate AS PreOpPSA_Date, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId, CAST(CASE WHEN LEFT(b.LabResult, 1) = '<' THEN SUBSTRING(b.LabResult, 2, 15) WHEN LEFT(b.LabResult, 1) = '~' THEN SUBSTRING(b.LabResult, 2, 15) WHEN LEFT(b.LabResult, 9) = 'less than' THEN SUBSTRING(b.LabResult, 10, 15) WHEN LEFT(b.LabResult, 5) = 'below' THEN SUBSTRING(b.LabResult, 6, 15) WHEN ISNUMERIC(b.LabResult) = 1 THEN b.LabResult ELSE NULL END AS DECIMAL (10,4)) PreOpPSA
FROM ProstatectomyTemp a INNER JOIN LabTests b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId WHERE b.LabDate = (SELECT MAX(c.LabDate) FROM LabTests c WHERE c.PatientId = b.PatientId AND c.LabTest = 'PSA' AND c.LabDate < a.ProcDate ) AND b.LabResult IS NOT NULL AND b.Labtest = 'PSA' GROUP BY b.LabDate, b.LabResult, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId )AS LabPrePSA ON a.PatientId = LabPrePSA.PatientId AND a.ProcedureId = LabPrePSA.ProcedureId INNER JOIN /*-- PathGGS (prostatectomy pathology gleason grade sum) PathGGS is 6 and Path T Stage at time of prostatectomy was T2a or T2b */ (SELECT PathologyStageGrade.PathStageT AS PathStageT, Pathology.PathologyId, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId, ProstatectomyPath.PathGG1, ProstatectomyPath.PathGG2, ProstatectomyPath.PathGGS AS PathGGS --, count (*) FROM ProstatectomyTemp a INNER JOIN Pathology ON a.PatientId = Pathology.PatientId AND a.ProcedureId = Pathology.ProcedureId INNER JOIN PathologyStageGrade ON Pathology.PathologyId = PathologyStageGrade.PathologyId INNER JOIN ProstatectomyPath ON Pathology.PathologyId = ProstatectomyPath.PathologyId WHERE ProstatectomyPath.PathGGS = '6' AND (PathStageT LIKE '%T2a%' OR PathStageT LIKE '%T2b%') Group by PathologyStageGrade.PathStageT, Pathology.PathologyId, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId, ProstatectomyPath.PathGG1, ProstatectomyPath.PathGG2, ProstatectomyPath.PathGGS) AS GleasonGrade ON a.PatientId = GleasonGrade.PatientId AND a.ProcedureId = GleasonGrade.ProcedureId INNER JOIN -- Appointment info: Appointment physician is Mary Schoen and procedure is done between 3 and 5 years since their prostatectomy at MSK (SELECT b.ApptMRN, b.ApptLastName, b.ApptFirstName, b.ApptBirthDate, b.ApptPhysician, b.ApptTime, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId FROM ProstatectomyTemp a INNER JOIN Appointments b ON a.PtMrn = b.ApptMRN WHERE ApptPhysician = 'SCHOEN, MARY' AND DATEDIFF(DAY, ProcDate, @Apptdte) >1089 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, ProcDate, @Apptdte) <1826 AND ApptTime >= @Apptdte GROUP BY b.ApptMRN, b.ApptLastName, b.ApptFirstName, b.ApptBirthDate, b.ApptPhysician, b.ApptTime, a.PatientId, a.ProcedureId) AS Appointments ON a.PtMrn = Appointments.ApptMRN WHERE PreOpPSA <= 4

report.reportDescription: Shows 04-132 Appointments within date range[specify] for MSK Physicians specified in query
report.sqlStatement: SELECT Patients.PtMRN, Patients.PtFirstName, Patients.PtLastName, Procedures.ProcDate AS SurgeryDate, Appointments.ApptTime, Appointments.ApptPhysician, Appointments.ApptVisitType, Protocols.ProtocolNum, PatientProtocolStatus.PtProtocolStatus, Procedures.ProcInstitution FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions ON Patients.PatientId = PatientInstitutions.PatientId INNER JOIN Procedures ON Patients.PatientId = Procedures.PatientId INNER JOIN ProstatectomyProc ON Procedures.ProcedureId = ProstatectomyProc.ProcedureId INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.PtMRN = Appointments.ApptMRN INNER JOIN PatientProtocols ON Patients.PatientId = PatientProtocols.PatientId INNER JOIN Protocols ON PatientProtocols.ProtocolId = Protocols.ProtocolId INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus ON PatientProtocols.PatientProtocolId = PatientProtocolStatus.PatientProtocolId WHERE PatientInstitutions.InstitutionId = 1 AND (Procedures.ProcInstitution LIKE '%memorial%' OR Procedures.ProcInstitution LIKE '%msk%') AND PatientProtocolStatus.PtProtocolStatus LIKE '%conse%' AND Protocols.ProtocolNum = '04-132' AND (Appointments.ApptTime BETWEEN GETDATE() AND DATEADD(day, 9, GETDATE()) AND Appointments.ApptTime > DATEADD(day, 35, ProcDate) AND Appointments.ApptTime < DATEADD(day, 365, ProcDate)) AND (Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%eastham%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%sogani%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%carver%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%scardino%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%guillonneau%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%touijer%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%rabbani%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%laudone%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%coleman%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%bochner%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%herr%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%donat%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%sheinfeld%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%russo%') ORDER BY Appointments.ApptTime ASC, Appointments.ApptPhysician ASC

report.reportDescription: Shows 90-040 Appointments within date range[specify] for MSK Physicians specified in query
report.sqlStatement: SELECT Patients.PtMRN, Patients.PtFirstName, Patients.PtLastName, Procedures.ProcDate AS SurgeryDate, Appointments.ApptTime, Appointments.ApptPhysician, Appointments.ApptVisitType, Protocols.ProtocolNum, PatientProtocolStatus.PtProtocolStatus, Procedures.ProcInstitution FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions ON Patients.PatientId = PatientInstitutions.PatientId INNER JOIN Procedures ON Patients.PatientId = Procedures.PatientId INNER JOIN ProstatectomyProc ON Procedures.ProcedureId = ProstatectomyProc.ProcedureId INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.PtMRN = Appointments.ApptMRN INNER JOIN PatientProtocols ON Patients.PatientId = PatientProtocols.PatientId INNER JOIN Protocols ON PatientProtocols.ProtocolId = Protocols.ProtocolId INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus ON PatientProtocols.PatientProtocolId = PatientProtocolStatus.PatientProtocolId WHERE PatientInstitutions.InstitutionId = 1 AND (Procedures.ProcInstitution LIKE '%memorial%' OR Procedures.ProcInstitution LIKE '%msk%') AND PatientProtocolStatus.PtProtocolStatus LIKE '%conse%' AND Protocols.ProtocolNum = '90-040' AND (Appointments.ApptTime BETWEEN GETDATE() AND DATEADD(day, 9, GETDATE()) AND Appointments.ApptTime > DATEADD(day, 180, ProcDate) AND Appointments.ApptTime < DATEADD(day, 365, ProcDate)) AND (Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%eastham%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%sogani%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%carver%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%scardino%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%guillonneau%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%touijer%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%rabbani%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%laudone%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%coleman%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%bochner%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%herr%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%donat%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%sheinfeld%' OR Appointments.ApptPhysician LIKE '%russo%') ORDER BY Appointments.ApptTime ASC, Appointments.ApptPhysician ASC

report.reportDescription: No Description
Post radical prostatectomy survivorship analysis
report.sqlStatement:
WITH NumericPSAs_CTE (LabTestId, PatientId, LabDate, LabResult) AS ( SELECT LabTestId, PatientId, LabDate, CASE WHEN IsNumeric(LabResult) = 1 AND LabResult NOT LIKE '%^[0123456789.]%' THEN Convert(float, LabResult) ELSE 0 END FROM LabTests WHERE LabDate IS NOT NULL AND LabTest = 'PSA' AND LabResult IS NOT NULL )
SELECT Patients.PtMRN, Patients.PtFirstName, Patients.PtLastName, Procedures.ProcDate, Procedures.ProcDateText AS RPDate, MIN(MedicalTherapy.MedTxDate) as FirstHormDate, MIN(RadiationTherapy.RadTxDate) as FirstXRTDate, CASE WHEN MIN(MedicalTherapy.MedTxDate) > Procedures.ProcDate THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS PostRPHormones, CASE WHEN MIN(RadiationTherapy.RadTxDate) > Procedures.ProcDate THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS PostRPRadiotherapy, LabTests.LabResult AS PSA, LabTests.LabDateText AS PSADate, BCR.LabResult AS BCR_PSA, BCR.LabDateText AS BCR_Date, PP.PathGG1, PP.PathGG2, PP.PathMargin as Margin, PP.PathSV_Inv as SVI, PP.PathExtension as ECE, Pathology.PathResult as LNI, ProstatectomyProc.ProcL_NVB_Status, ProstatectomyProc.ProcR_NVB_Status, CASE WHEN ProstatectomyProc.ProcL_NVB_Status IN ('Preserved', 'Possible damage') AND ProstatectomyProc.ProcR_NVB_Status IN ('Preserved', 'Possible damage') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS BilateralNerveSparing, ( SELECT Comorbidity + ',' FROM Comorbidities WHERE PatientId = Patients.PatientId FOR XML PATH('') ) AS PatientComorbidities FROM Patients INNER JOIN Procedures ON Patients.PatientId = Procedures.PatientId
LEFT OUTER JOIN ProstatectomyPath PP ON PP.PathologyId = ( SELECT TOP 1 a.PathologyId FROM Pathology a INNER JOIN ProstatectomyPath b ON a.PathologyId = b.PathologyId WHERE a.ProcedureId = Procedures.ProcedureId ORDER BY CASE a.PathQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'STD' THEN 3 WHEN 'REV' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN LabTests ON Procedures.PatientId = LabTests.PatientId AND LabTests.LabTest = 'PSA' AND LabTests.LabTestId = ( SELECT TOP 1 LabTestId FROM LabTests WHERE PatientId = Procedures.PatientId AND LabTest = 'PSA' AND DATEDIFF(day,Procedures.ProcDate,LabDate) <= 0 ORDER BY DATEDIFF(day,Procedures.ProcDate,LabDate) DESC, CASE LabQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'STD' THEN 3 WHEN 'REV' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC, LabResult DESC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN LabTests BCR ON Procedures.PatientId = BCR.PatientId AND BCR.LabTestId = ( SELECT TOP 1 LabTestId FROM NumericPSAs_CTE _bcr WHERE _bcr.PatientId = Procedures.PatientId AND _bcr.LabDate > Procedures.ProcDate AND _bcr.LabResult >= .2 AND _bcr.LabResult > ( SELECT TOP 1 LabResult FROM NumericPSAs_CTE WHERE PatientId = Procedures.PatientId AND LabDate < _bcr.LabDate ORDER BY LabDate DESC ) ORDER BY _bcr.LabDate ASC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN ProstatectomyProc ON Procedures.ProcedureId = ProstatectomyProc.ProcedureId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Procedures PLND ON Procedures.PatientId = PLND.PatientId AND PLND.ProcName = 'PLND'
LEFT OUTER JOIN Pathology ON Pathology.PathologyId = ( SELECT TOP 1 PathologyId FROM Pathology WHERE ProcedureId = PLND.ProcedureId AND PathSpecimenType = 'PLND' ORDER BY CASE PathQuality WHEN 'RR' THEN 4 WHEN 'STD' THEN 3 WHEN 'REV' THEN 2 WHEN 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END DESC )
LEFT OUTER JOIN MedicalTherapy ON Procedures.PatientId = MedicalTherapy.PatientId AND ((MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE '%HORM%') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType = 'ORCH') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType ='Bilateral Orchiectomy') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE 'ORCH_BIL%') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE '%LHRH%') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE '%AA%') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE '%ESTROGEN%') OR (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType LIKE '%PROGEST%')) AND (MedicalTherapy.MedTxType NOT LIKE '%STOP')
LEFT OUTER JOIN RadiationTherapy ON Procedures.PatientId = RadiationTherapy.PatientId AND RadiationTherapy.RadTxType IN ('XRT','EBRT','RT','COMBO','BRACHY','COMBO','RADIOISOTOPE','SEED','IMPLANT','Brachytherapy', 'External Beam','Radiation Therapy, Unspecified','External Beam, IMRT', 'High-Dose Rate Brachytherapy','External Beam, 3D Conventional','External Beam, 3D Conformal')
WHERE Procedures.ProcName IN ('CP','LP','LP_CONV','PP','RALP','RP','SalvCP','SalvLP','SalvRP') AND Procedures.ProcDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate
GROUP BY Patients.PatientId, Patients.PtMRN, Patients.PtFirstName, Patients.PtLastName, Procedures.ProcDate, Procedures.ProcDateText, LabTests.LabDateText, LabTests.LabResult, BCR.LabDateText, BCR.LabResult, PP.PathGG1, PP.PathGG2, PP.PathMargin, PP.PathSV_Inv, PP.PathExtension, Pathology.PathResult, ProstatectomyProc.ProcL_NVB_Status, ProstatectomyProc.ProcR_NVB_Status
ORDER BY Procedures.ProcDate DESC, Patients.PatientId

report.reportDescription: HCGN AFP Between
report.sqlStatement:
SELECT a.PtMRN as MRN, a.LabTest, a.LabDate, a.RPLNDDate, a.OrchDate, a.LabResult, a.NumericLabResult, a.Levels FROM (SELECT a.Patientid, PtMrn, LabTest, CONVERT(varchar, labdate, 101) LabDate , CONVERT(varchar,RPLNDdate,101) RPLNDDate, Convert(varchar, Orchdate,101)OrchDate, LabResult, NumericLabResult, (CASE WHEN (NumericLabResult between '0' and '2.2') and LabTest = 'HCGN' THEN 'Normal' WHEN (NumericLabResult between '0' and '6.1') and LabTest = 'AFP' THEN 'Normal' WHEN Labresult = 'NMA' THEN 'Normal' ELSE 'Abnormal'End)Levels --Connecting to Patients to get narrow down male patients and get ptmrn FROM Patients a INNER JOIN --First group of labresults for HCGN labtests (SELECT Patientid, LabResult, labtest, labdate,RPLNDdate, Orchdate, NumericLabResult from ( --Casting all labresults as money to ensure they can be sorted properly and still retain the --decimal places SELECT Patientid, labtest, labdate, rplnddate, orchdate, LabResult, CAST(NumResult as money) as NumericLabResult FROM ( SElECT Patientid, labtest, number, labresult, Case when newresult <> 'NMA' then newresult else null end NumResult, labdate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM (
SELECT a.Patientid, labtest, ISNUMERIC(LabResult) Number, LabResult, (CASE WHEN (LabResult like '%<%' or LabResult like '%>%') THEN ltrim(substring(labresult, 2, 5)) ELSE LabResult END) NewResult, a.labdate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM ( Select a.Patientid, Max(LabDate)LabDate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM LabTests a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.Patientid,PathDate RPLNDDate, orchdate FROM Pathology a INNER JOIN (SELECT Patientid, PathDate Orchdate FROM Pathology WHERE PathSpecimenType like '%Orchiectomy%')b on a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE PathSpecimenType = 'RPLND' ) b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE Labtest = 'HCGN' and ((labdate between orchdate and rplnddate) or (labdate between rplnddate and orchdate)) GROUP BY a.Patientid, rplnddate, orchdate ) a INNER JOIN LabTests b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid and a.LabDate = b.LabDate WHERE b.LabTest = 'HCGN' GROUP BY a.patientid, LabResult,labtest, a.LabDate, rplnddate, orchdate ) c )d )b
UNION ALL --Doing all the above operations for AFP labtests and union all to get one comprehensive list SELECT Patientid, LabResult, labtest, labdate, rplnddate, orchdate, NumericLabResult from ( SELECT Patientid, labtest, labdate, rplnddate, orchdate, LabResult, CAST(NumResult as money) as NumericLabResult FROM ( SElECT Patientid, labtest, number, labresult, Case when newresult <> 'NMA' then newresult else null end NumResult, labdate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM (
SELECT a.Patientid, labtest, ISNUMERIC(LabResult) Number, LabResult, (CASE WHEN (LabResult like '%<%' or LabResult like '%>%') THEN ltrim(substring(labresult, 2, 5)) ELSE LabResult END) NewResult, a.labdate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM ( Select a.Patientid, Max(LabDate)LabDate, rplnddate, orchdate FROM LabTests a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.Patientid,PathDate RPLNDDate, orchdate FROM Pathology a INNER JOIN (SELECT Patientid, PathDate Orchdate FROM Pathology WHERE PathSpecimenType like '%Orchiectomy%')b on a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE PathSpecimenType = 'RPLND' ) b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE Labtest = 'AFP' and ((labdate between orchdate and rplnddate) or (labdate between rplnddate and orchdate)) GROUP BY a.Patientid, rplnddate, orchdate ) a INNER JOIN LabTests b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid and a.LabDate = b.LabDate WHERE b.LabTest = 'AFP' GROUP BY a.patientid, LabResult,labtest, a.LabDate, rplnddate, orchdate ) c )d )b ) b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE a.PtGender = 'Male' )a INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE b.InstitutionId = 1 ORDER BY ptmrn DESC

report.reportDescription: HCGN AFP Report
report.sqlStatement:
SELECT a.PtMRN as MRN, a.LabTest, a.LabDate, a.RPLNDDate, a.LabResult, a.NumericLabResult, a.Levels FROM (SELECT a.Patientid, PtMRN, LabTest, CONVERT(varchar, LabDate, 101) LabDate, CONVERT(varchar, RPLNDdate, 101) RPLNDDate, LabResult, NumericLabResult, (CASE WHEN (NumericLabResult between '0' and '2.2') and LabTest = 'HCGN' THEN 'Normal' WHEN (NumericLabResult between '0' and '6.1') and LabTest = 'AFP' THEN 'Normal' WHEN NumericLabResult IS NULL THEN 'Normal' ELSE 'Abnormal'End)Levels FROM Patients a INNER JOIN (SELECT Patientid, LabResult, labtest, labdate, RPLNDdate, NumericLabResult from ( SELECT Patientid, labtest, LabResult, CAST(NumResult as money) NumericLabResult, labdate, RPLNDdate FROM ( Select Patientid, labtest, number, labresult, Case when newresult <> 'NMA' then newresult else null end NumResult, labdate, rplnddate from ( SELECT a.Patientid, labtest, ISNUMERIC(LabResult) Number, LabResult, (CASE WHEN (LabResult like '%<%' or LabResult like '%>%') THEN ltrim(substring(labresult, 2, 5)) ELSE LabResult END) NewResult, --Case when labresult <> 'NMA' then labresult Else NULL End NumericResult, a.labdate, RPLNDdate FROM (Select a.Patientid, Max(LabDate)LabDate, ProcDate RPLNDdate FROM LabTests a INNER JOIN Procedures b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE Labtest = 'HCGN' and ProcName = 'RPLND' and LabDate < ProcDate --and LabResult not like ('%[a-z]%') GROUP BY a.Patientid, Procdate) a INNER JOIN LabTests b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid and a.LabDate = b.LabDate WHERE b.LabTest = 'HCGN' --and LabResult not like ('%[a-z]%') GROUP BY a.patientid, LabResult,labtest, a.LabDate, RPLNDdate ) a ) c )b
UNION ALL
SELECT Patientid, LabResult, labtest, labdate, RPLNDdate, NumericLabResult from ( SELECT Patientid, labtest, LabResult, CAST(NumResult as money) NumericLabResult, labdate, RPLNDdate FROM ( Select Patientid, labtest, number, labresult, Case when newresult <> 'NMA' then newresult else null end NumResult, labdate, rplnddate from ( SELECT a.Patientid, labtest, ISNUMERIC(LabResult) Number, LabResult, (CASE WHEN (LabResult like '%<%' or LabResult like '%>%') THEN ltrim(substring(labresult, 2, 5)) ELSE LabResult END) NewResult, a.labdate, RPLNDdate FROM (Select a.Patientid, Max(LabDate)LabDate, ProcDate RPLNDdate FROM LabTests a INNER JOIN Procedures b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE Labtest = 'AFP' and ProcName = 'RPLND' and LabDate < ProcDate GROUP BY a.Patientid, Procdate) a INNER JOIN LabTests b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid and a.LabDate = b.LabDate WHERE b.LabTest = 'AFP' GROUP BY a.patientid, LabResult,labtest, a.LabDate, RPLNDdate ) a ) c )b ) b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE a.PtGender = 'Male' ) a INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions b ON a.Patientid = b.Patientid WHERE b.Institutionid = 1 ORDER BY PtMRN

report.reportDescription: Lists patients by Protocol Number, Appointment Date and Current Medical Therapy
report.sqlStatement:
SELECT CONVERT(varchar,f.apptclinicdate,101) Clinic_Date, LTRIM(RTRIM(RIGHT(f.appttime, 8))) Appt_Time, a.ptfirstname First_Name, a.ptlastname Last_Name, a.ptmrn PtMRN, SPACE(30), Protocolnum, ApptPhysician, ApptVisitType Visit_Type, e.CurrentTherapies Current_Treatment FROM patients a INNER JOIN patientprotocols b on a.patientid = b.patientid INNER JOIN protocols c on b.protocolid = c.protocolid INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus d on b.patientprotocolid = d.patientprotocolid INNER JOIN ( SELECT patientid, 'CurrentTherapies' = MAX(CASE rowno WHEN 1 THEN a.MedTxAgent END) + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 2 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 3 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 4 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 5 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 6 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') + coalesce(MAX(CASE a.rowno WHEN 7 THEN ', ' + a.MedTxAgent END), '') FROM
( SELECT patientid, medtxagent, row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY patientid ORDER BY medtxagent DESC) AS 'rowno' FROM ( SELECT a.patientid, medtxagent, maxmedtxdate FROM medicaltherapy a INNER JOIN (SELECT patientid, max(medtxdate) maxmedtxdate FROM medicaltherapy WHERE medtxstopdate IS NULL GROUP BY patientid ) b on a.patientid = b.patientid AND a.medtxdate = b.maxmedtxdate ) z ) a
GROUP BY patientid ) e on a.patientid = e.patientid INNER JOIN appointments f on a.patientid = f.apptpatientid WHERE c.protocolnum = @ProtocolNum AND apptclinicdate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate GROUP BY f.apptclinicdate, f.appttime, a.ptfirstname, a.ptlastname, a.ptmrn, Protocolnum, ApptPhysician, ApptVisitType, e.CurrentTherapies ORDER BY ptmrn, apptclinicdate desc

report.reportDescription: EForms status (open, approved, etc..) listed by name and date
report.sqlStatement: SELECT b.PtMrn as MRN, a.EformName as EFORM, a.CurrentStatus as STATUS, a.EformApptPhysician as DOCTOR, a.EformApptTime as APPTTIME, a.EnteredBy as ENTEREDBY, a.EnteredTime as ENTEREDTIME FROM EForms a INNER JOIN Patients b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId WHERE (a.EformName LIKE '%' + @EformName + '%' AND PtMRN NOT IN ('TEST0001', 'TEst12321', 'TEST0000')) AND (a.EnteredTime >= @FromDate AND a.EnteredTime < = @ToDate) ORDER BY a.EnteredTime DESC

report.reportDescription: approved eForms with elapsed time from start to approval
report.sqlStatement: SELECT PtMrn as MRN, EformName as EFORM, CurrentStatus as STATUS, EnteredBy As ENTEREDBY, ENTEREDTIME as ENTEREDTIME, APPROVEDBY as APPROVEDBY, APPROVEDTIME as APPROVEDTIME, CAST((Minutes / 60) AS VARCHAR(8)) + ':' + CAST((Minutes % 60) AS VARCHAR(2)) AS 'ELAPSEDTIME' FROM ( SELECT b.PtMrn, a.EformName, a.CurrentStatus, a.EformApptPhysician, a.EnteredBy, a.EnteredTime, c.UpdatedBy ApprovedBy, c.UpdatedTime ApprovedTime, CAST(DATEDIFF (Minute, a.EnteredTime , c.UpdatedTime) AS varchar) AS Minutes FROM EForms a INNER JOIN Patients b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId INNER JOIN EformLog c on a.EformId = c.EformId WHERE a.EformName LIKE '%' + @EformName + '%' AND PtMRN NOT IN ('TEST0001', 'TEst12321', 'TEST0000') AND (a.EnteredTime >= @FromDate AND a.EnteredTime <= @ToDate) AND c.Status = 'Approved' ) EformStats ORDER BY ApprovedTime Desc

report.reportDescription: Displays the patients latest status on the specified protocol, as well as potential patients who have never been screened for the specified protocol.
Shows most recent protocol status for patients of the specified Physicians within an appointment range
report.sqlStatement: SELECT ApptPhysician Physician, CONVERT(Varchar(10), Appttime, 101)ApptDate, Convert(varchar(10), Appttime, 108)ApptTime, PtMRN MRN, (PtLastName+', '+PtFirstName) Name, DateDiff(yyyy, ApptBirthDate, GetDate()) as Age, ApptVisitType 'Visit Type', ProtocolNum Protocol, Convert(Varchar(10),ProtocolStatusDate,101) 'Status Date', d.PtProtocolStatus 'Status', d.PtProtocolStatusReason Reason, PtProtocolStatusNotes Notes, d.Enteredby 'Recorded By' FROM Protocols a INNER JOIN PatientProtocols b on a.ProtocolId = b.ProtocolId INNER JOIN Patients p ON b.Patientid = p.Patientid INNER JOIN ( SELECT Patientid, protocolid, MAX(PtProtocolStatusDate)protocolstatusdate FROM PatientProtocols a INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus b ON a.PatientProtocolId = b.PatientProtocolId GROUP BY Patientid, protocolid ) c ON a.protocolid = c.protocolid and b.patientid = c.patientid INNER JOIN PatientProtocolStatus d on c.ProtocolStatusdate = d.ptprotocolstatusdate and b.patientprotocolid = d.patientprotocolid INNER JOIN Appointments e ON p.patientid = e.ApptPatientid WHERE (e.ApptClinicDate BETWEEN @FromDate and @ToDate) and ApptPhysician LIKE '%' + @Physician + '%' ORDER BY Ptmrn asc, ApptClinicDate asc, ProtocolStatusDate desc

report.reportDescription: Report to show which patients have MRN cross reference issue
report.sqlStatement: SELECT a.PtMRN, a.PtLastName, a.PtFirstName, a.PtBirthDateText, a.EnteredTime, b.Identifier PT_XREF_MRN, CASE WHEN c.PtMRN IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END XREF_MRN_InCaisis, STUFF((SELECT ',' + d.Institution AS [text()] FROM Institutions d INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions e ON d.InstitutionId=e.InstitutionId WHERE a.PatientId = e.PatientId FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '' ) + ISNULL((SELECT ',' + d.Institution + ' (XREF)' AS [text()] FROM Institutions d INNER JOIN PatientInstitutions e ON d.InstitutionId=e.InstitutionId WHERE c.PatientId = e.PatientId FOR XML PATH('') ),'') AS DatasetList FROM Patients a INNER JOIN Identifiers b ON a.PatientId = b.PatientId LEFT OUTER JOIN Patients c ON c.PtMRN = b.Identifier WHERE IdType = 'PT_XREF_MRN' ORDER BY EnteredTime
